# Bellavier Group ERP ‚Äî Roadmap Tasks 76‚Äì100  
**Version: 2025-11-18**  
**Status: DRAFT (Autogenerated by AI Assistant)**  

This document continues the long‚Äëterm roadmap beyond Task 75, expanding all three pillars (Stability, Performance, Developer Experience, plus a new pillar: Autonomy).

---

# üß± Pillar 4 ‚Äî Autonomy Phase (Tasks 76‚Äì100)

The Autonomy Phase transforms Bellavier Group ERP from ‚ÄúAI‚Äëassisted‚Äù into a **Fully Autonomous Luxury Manufacturing Cloud**.  
This is the foundation of building the world‚Äôs first *Distributed AI‚ÄëOrchestrated Atelier Network*.

---  

## **Task 76 ‚Äî Global Production Graph v2**
### Goal  
Upgrade the internal routing graph system to a unified ‚ÄúGlobal Production Graph‚Äù that spans all tenants, ateliers, nodes, and product types.

### Deliverables  
- Cross-tenant graph representation  
- Node capability tagging  
- Node health & latency scoring  
- Visualizer UI (internal only)

### Technical Specifications  
- Detailed workflow mapping required for this task  
- Define input/output data formats  
- Define internal services this task depends on  
- Define cross-tenant impacts  
- Define backward compatibility requirements  
- Identify database schema changes (if any)  
- Clarify security & permission model  
- Expected API endpoints (draft)  
- Expected data volume & performance constraints  

### Risks & Mitigation  
- List all possible risks related to this task  
- Define mitigation strategies  
- Identify potential breakpoints in existing ERP code  
- Identify resource-heavy operations and optimization targets

## **Task 100 ‚Äî Fully Autonomous Luxury Manufacturing OS**
### Goal  
Bellavier Group ERP becomes a fully autonomous system capable of:

### Capabilities  
- Zero manual routing
